title: Add’l Foreign Secretary discusses ties with Bangladesh commerce secretary
content:
ISLAMABAD, Mar 5 (APP): Additional Foreign Secretary (Asia & Pacific) Ambassador Imran Ahmed Siddiqui on Wednesday met with Secretary Commerce of Bangladesh Mahbubur Rahman here.
In the meeting, both sides discussed various aspects of bilateral economic and trade relations and expressed satisfaction over the growing momentum of these relations.
They also discussed prospects of further enhancing these relations in the coming days.
Ishtiaq Ahmed, APP’s Foreign Editor, leads coverage of the Prime Minister, President and Foreign Office, bringing over 20 years of journalism experience from local and international publications – Reach out at 03335293238/ ishtiaqrao@gmail.com/ X: ishtiaqrao
